subject: Need help to test DAO using FireStormDAO using JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi there, I am using FireStorm of www.Codefutures.com to generate DAO. it will generate DAO interface and DAOImplementation classes. when i generate automated
messageBody:
Hi there,

I am using FireStorm of www.Codefutures.com to generate DAO. it will
generate DAO interface and DAOImplementation classes. when i generate
automated JUnit test class, should i create on DAOImplementation or DAO
interface.

My feeling is that I should use DAOImplementation classes as there are
SQL queries and methods like CRUD operations are implemented in
DAOImpl.jav class rather DAO interface.


help will be appreciated.
